AltName.entry: LONGLEY ORGANISED COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION LIMITED (LOCAL) (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Provides sessional space for activities, meetings, training, parties etc. Currently offering; ESOL, streetdance for kids, Zumba, Salsa, arts and crafts and football. Also have managed workspace for hire and a community café that offers off site catering (see separate entry). Also houses a cleaning company (Clean and Bright), Faith in Families (adoption and fostering placements) and All Star Dance Company. Registered charity and Company limited by guarantee no 3554817.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-4pm (reception), Mon-Fri 7am-2pm (café), Mon 6-7pm (Zumba), Mon & Wed 1-3pm (ESOL), Tues 4.15-5.15pm (arts and crafts), 5.30-6.30pm (Streetdance), Wed 6-7pm (Salsa)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
